name: Skyward Vendetta
desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "Critical Boost," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of 150%.
enhanced_desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "Critical Boost," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of 240%.
